description: Shikinami Asuka Langley is the "Second Children" of the Marduk Report and the pilot of http://anidb.net/ch8705 [EVA-02]. She is used by http://anidb.net/ch5009 [Nerv] as a tool in their struggle against the Angels. In contrast with the original story, Asuka is now referred to as holding the rank of captain, and her family name was also changed from Souryuu to Shikinami.
name: Shikinami Asuka Langley
